DOC.brief_summary: This is a pilot study to investigate the performance of MR-guided Laser Induced Thermal Therapy (LITT) in the treatment of liver tumors.
DOC.brief_title: MR-Guided Laser Ablation of Hepatic Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients with soft tissue tumor metastases to the liver who are referred to Interventional Radiology for treatment.
